body.p: The Miramo installation includes two test files in the ’tmp’ folder within the Miramo installation folder: ’test.xml’ and ’testbook.xml’
Once Miramo In a DOS command window, enter the following commands:cd /d "%MM_HOME%/tmp" miramo -Opdf test.pdf test.xml miramo -Opdf testbook.pdf testbook.xml
The ’test’ jobs will be visible in the mmVisor ’Jobs’ window area:
